languages.text: When the Overseer falls unconscious, the Servoskull Swarm provokes WIL Save {uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} for all enemies in a 9x9 circle and then deactivates. On a fail, the enemy receives {g|f:f1c0c6bee3c54cc694c1d1746eafcb15}Stunned{/g} for 1 round. Otherwise, the enemy is {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} for 1 round. This ability doesn't affect boss-type enemies.

traits.locale_text: When the Overseer falls unconscious, the Servoskull Swarm provokes WIL Save {uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} for all enemies in a 9x9 circle and then deactivates. On a fail, the enemy receives {g|f:f1c0c6bee3c54cc694c1d1746eafcb15}Stunned{/g} for 1 round. Otherwise, the enemy is {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}Slowed{/g} for 1 round. This ability doesn't affect boss-type enemies.

languages.text:
When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} penalty. Those who fail the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round. Those who succeed, become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round. After that, the servo-skull swarm is deactivated.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} does not affect certain powerful enemies.
languages.original_text:
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} падает {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, противники в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}. В случае провала они оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} на 1 раунд. В случае успеха — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлены{/g} на 1 раунд. После этого рой сервочерепов деактивируется.
! Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} не действует на некоторых сильных врагов.

traits.locale_text:
When the Overseer falls unconscious, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm make a Willpower resistance test with a −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} penalty. Those who fail the test, become stunned for 1 round. Those who succeed, become slowed for 1 round. After that, the servo-skull swarm is deactivated.
! This ability does not affect certain powerful enemies.

When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test with a −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} penalty. Those who fail the test, become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round. Those who succeed, become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round. After that, the servo-skull swarm is deactivated.
! This ability does not affect certain powerful enemies.

When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test with a −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} penalty. Those who fail the test, become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round. Those who succeed, become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round. After that, the servo-skull swarm is deactivated.
! This ability does not affect certain powerful enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Когда надзиратель падает без сознания, противники в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}. В случае провала они оказываются оглушены на 1 раунд. В случае успеха — замедлены на 1 раунд. После этого рой сервочерепов деактивируется.
! Эта способность не действует на некоторых сильных врагов.

Когда надзиратель падает без сознания, противники в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}. В случае провала они оказываются оглушены на 1 раунд. В случае успеха — замедлены на 1 раунд. После этого рой сервочерепов деактивируется.
! Эта способность не действует на некоторых сильных врагов.

languages.text:
Verliert der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} das {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}Bewusstsein{/g}, machen Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}. Misslingt die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} wird der jeweilige Gegner 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}. Gegner, deren Probe gelingt, werden 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}. Danach wird der Servoschädel-Schwarm deaktiviert.
! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} hat auf einige mächtige Gegner keinen Einfluss.

traits.locale_text:

Misslingt die Probe wird der jeweilige Gegner 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}. Gegner, deren Probe gelingt, werden 1 Runde lang {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}. Danach wird der Servoschädel-Schwarm deaktiviert.

languages.text:
Quand le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g}, les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes doivent faire un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}. S'ils échouent, ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdis{/g} pendant 1 round. S'ils réussissent, ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentis{/g} pendant 1 round. L'essaim de servocrânes se désactive ensuite.
! Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne fonctionne pas sur certains ennemis puissants.{g|Encyclopedia:Test}{/g}

traits.locale_text:
Quand le surveillant perd connaissance, les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes doivent faire un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}. S'ils échouent, ils sont étourdis pendant 1 round. S'ils réussissent, ils sont ralentis pendant 1 round. L'essaim de servocrânes se désactive ensuite.
! Cette capacité ne fonctionne pas sur certains ennemis puissants.

S'ils échouent, ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdis{/g} pendant 1 round. S'ils réussissent, ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentis{/g} pendant 1 round. L'essaim de servocrânes se désactive ensuite.
! Cette capacité ne fonctionne pas sur certains ennemis puissants.

S'ils échouent, ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdis{/g} pendant 1 round. S'ils réussissent, ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentis{/g} pendant 1 round. languages.text:
当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，距离伺服头骨集群距离4格内的所有敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}减值。若未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，则陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一轮，若通过检定，则陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一轮。之后，伺服头骨集群停止运作。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}对某些较为强大的敌人无效。
languages.original_text:
When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} penalty. Those who fail the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round. Those who succeed, become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round. After that, the servo-skull swarm is deactivated.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} does not affect certain powerful enemies.

traits.locale_text:
当监察官陷入昏迷状态时，距离伺服头骨集群距离4格内的所有敌人都需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}减值。若未能通过检定，则陷入眩晕状态，持续一轮，若通过检定，则陷入减速状态，持续一轮。之后，伺服头骨集群停止运作。
！此能力对某些较为强大的敌人无效。

当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，距离伺服头骨集群距离4格内的所有敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}减值。若未能通过检定，则陷入{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态，持续一轮，若通过检定，则陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，持续一轮。之后，伺服头骨集群停止运作。
！此能力对某些较为强大的敌人无效。

languages.text:
Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} queda {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, los enemigos en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos hacen una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f}. Los enemigos que fallan la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} quedan {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} durante 1 asalto. Los que la superan quedan {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Después, el enjambre de servocráneos queda inactivo.
! Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} no afecta a algunos enemigos más poderosos.

After that, the servo-skull swarm is deactivated.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} does not affect certain powerful enemies.

Los enemigos que fallan la prueba quedan aturdidos durante 1 asalto. Los que la superan quedan ralentizados durante 1 asalto. Después, el enjambre de servocráneos queda inactivo.
! Esta capacidad no afecta a algunos enemigos más poderosos.

Después, el enjambre de servocráneos queda inactivo.
! Esta capacidad no afecta a algunos enemigos más poderosos.

！この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は、特定の強力な敵には効かない。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}{/g},

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düştüğünde hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar, −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girerler. {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Testte{/g} başarısız olanlar 1 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlerler{/g}. Testi geçenler ise 1 rauntluğuna {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlarlar{/g}. Ardından hizmelet sürüsü devre dışı kalır.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, bazı güçlü düşmanlara etki etmez.
languages.original_text:
When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} falls {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, enemies in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} penalty. Those who fail the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 round. Those who succeed, become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 round. After that, the servo-skull swarm is deactivated.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} does not affect certain powerful enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Gözetmen baygın düştüğünde hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar, −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} ceza puanına sahip bir İrade direnç testine girerler. Testte başarısız olanlar 1 rauntluğuna sersemlerler. Testi geçenler ise 1 rauntluğuna yavaşlarlar. Ardından hizmelet sürüsü devre dışı kalır.
! Bu kabiliyet, bazı güçlü düşmanlara etki etmez.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} baygın düştüğünde hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan düşmanlar, −{uip|Save|a62ff7d3719640d0b5f23976cbb9544f} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} direnç testine girerler. Testte başarısız olanlar 1 rauntluğuna sersemlerler. Testi geçenler ise 1 rauntluğuna yavaşlarlar. Ardından hizmelet sürüsü devre dışı kalır.
! Bu kabiliyet, bazı güçlü düşmanlara etki etmez.
